profileUpdateFailure: Error: Required fields are missing or contain incorrect data
loginFailureIncorrectLoginOrPassword: Incorrect login or password. Please try again.
loginFailureIncorrectUsername: User with the specified login or email not found.
accountLocked: Your account is locked. Please contact support.
passwordResetLinkSent: Password reset link sent to your email address.
passwordResetLinkSendFailure: An error occurred while sending the password reset link. Please try again later.
profileUpdateSuccess: Your profile has been successfully updated.
profileUpdateValidationFailure: Error: Please fill in all required fields.
profileUpdateTechnicalFailure: Error: Unable to update profile due to a technical issue. Please try again later.
profileUpdateConflict: Error: Another update to your profile is already in progress. Please try again later.
profileUpdateAuthorizationFailure: Error: You do not have permission to update this profile.
registrationFailureDuplicateEmail: A user with this email is already registered.
registrationFailureWeakPassword: Password is too weak. Please use a stronger password.
uploadFailure: Error uploading image. Please try again.
fileSizeExceeded: File size exceeded. Please choose a smaller file.
fileFormatError: Invalid file format. Please choose a file in a supported format (e.g., JPG, PNG).
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
deleteFailure: Error deleting image. Please try again or contact support.
testStarted: Test started. Please wait for the results.
testFailed: Test failed. Please check the results and try again.
lessonPassed: Great! You passed the lesson test!
testAborted: Test aborted. The process was interrupted.
testCantNext: Access denied! Please complete the previous test
